meanings.definition: A Middle Eastern dish made from ground chickpeas or fava beans formed into balls or patties and deep-fried.
meanings.sent1: I tried the delicious felafel at the new restaurant.
meanings.sent2: The food truck sells tasty felafel sandwiches.
meanings.sent3: The felafel rolled off the plate and onto the floor, making a mess.
meanings.sent4: Her love for felafel was as deep as the fryer it was cooked in.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly fried felafel filled the kitchen.

meanings.definition: A small, deep-fried ball or patty made from ground chickpeas or fava beans.
meanings.sent1: The street vendor served hot felafel with a side of tahini sauce.
meanings.sent2: She ordered a falafel wrap with extra felafel for lunch.
meanings.sent3: The felafel ball bounced off the plate and landed in her lap.
meanings.sent4: The felafel patty was a golden orb of deliciousness.
meanings.sent5: The crunch of the felafel was music to her ears.
